name: AudioValueTranslation
desc: Holds buffers used in translation operations.

items.name: init(mInputData: UnsafeMutableRawPointer, mInputDataSize: UInt32, mOutputData: UnsafeMutableRawPointer, mOutputDataSize: UInt32)
var mInputData: UnsafeMutableRawPointer
items.desc: The buffer containing the data to be translated.

items.name: var mInputDataSize: UInt32
items.desc: The number of bytes in the buffer pointed at by mInputData.

items.name: var mOutputData: UnsafeMutableRawPointer
items.desc: The buffer to hold the result of the translation.

items.name: var mOutputDataSize: UInt32
items.desc: The number of bytes in the buffer pointed at by mOutputData.
